definitions.title: n.pr.fl.
definitions.body: Arnon, wady & stream in Moab (MI [[ארנן]], Thes Add Rob Ges MV der. fr. [[רנן]], i.e. the rushing, roaring stream)—[[אַרְנוֹן]] Nu 21:13, Nu 21:13 + 12 t., [[אַרְנׂן]] Nu 21:14 + 10 t.—called boundary between Moab & Amorites Nu 21:13, Ju Jdg 11:18, Jdg 11:22 cf. [[גְּבוּל אֵרְנׂן]] Nu 22:36; oft. [[נַחַל אֵרְנׂן]] De 2:24, De 2:36, De 3:8, De 3:12, De 3:16, De 4:48, 2Ki 10:33; [[אַרְנוֹן]] ´[[נ]] Jos 12:1, Jos 12:2, Jos 13:9, Jos 13:16; [[הַנְּחָלִים אַרְנוֹן]] Nu 21:14, i.e. the stream-ravines that unite to form Arnon, cf. Di; also [[בָּמוֹת אַרְנׁן]] heights of Arnon Nu 21:28; [[מעברות אַרְנוֹן]] fords of Arnon Is 16:2; elsewh. Nu 21:13, Nu 21:24, Nu 21:26, Ju Jdg 11:13, Jdg 11:18, Jdg 11:26; syn. of Moab Je 48:20; (cf. Tristr:Moab 125 f.; mod. Môjib).
